allow: Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; data = json.load(sys.stdin); print(f''''Status: {data.get(""status"")}\nMessage: {data.get(""message"")}\nQuestions: {len(data.get(""quiz_data"", {}).get(""questions"", []))}'''')")
